languages.text: "Есть старая военная мудрость — если уже оказался в... передряге, не лезь туда, где находится неведомо что. Предлагаю убраться отсюда тем же путем, что и пришли".
"There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."
languages.original_text: "Есть старая военная мудрость — если уже оказался в... передряге, не лезь туда, где находится неведомо что. Предлагаю убраться отсюда тем же путем, что и пришли".

traits.locale_text: "There's an old military wisdom that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."
"There's an old military wisdom that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."
"There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."
"There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."
"There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."

languages.text: «Hay un viejo proverbio militar según el cual cuando ya se está en la mi... seria, es mejor no meterse en ningún lugar que no se haya explorado ya, porque no se sabe lo que puede haber en su interior. Propongo que salgamos por donde hemos entrado».
languages.original_text: "There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."

traits.locale_text: «Hay un viejo proverbio militar según el cual cuando ya se está en la mi... seria, es mejor no meterse en ningún lugar que no se haya explorado ya, porque no se sabe lo que puede haber en su interior. Propongo que salgamos por donde hemos entrado».

languages.text: “有句古老的军事格言说，在身陷险境的情况下，如果不知道前方等待着什么，最好不要到处乱探。我建议我们原路返回。”
languages.original_text: "There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."

traits.locale_text: “有句古老的军事格言说，在身陷险境的情况下，如果不知道前方等待着什么，最好不要到处乱探。我建议我们原路返回。”

languages.text: 「こういった古い軍の格言があります。すでにトラブルの…深みにハマっているなら、何が出てくるか分からない状況で、あちこち突いてはいけない、と。進入したときと同じ道から脱出しましょう」
languages.original_text: "There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."

traits.locale_text: 「こういった古い軍の格言があります。すでにトラブルの…深みにハマっているなら、何が出てくるか分からない状況で、あちこち突いてはいけない、と。進入したときと同じ道から脱出しましょう」

languages.text: "Ein alter Militärspruch besagt: Wenn du ganz tief in der ... Bredouille steckst, stocherst du nur dort herum, wo du ganz genau weißt, was du findest. Ich schlage vor, wir nehmen denselben Weg hinaus, wie wir reingekommen sind."
languages.original_text: "There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."

traits.locale_text: "Ein alter Militärspruch besagt: Wenn du ganz tief in der ... Bredouille steckst, stocherst du nur dort herum, wo du ganz genau weißt, was du findest. Ich schlage vor, wir nehmen denselben Weg hinaus, wie wir reingekommen sind."

languages.text: « Il y a un vieil adage militaire qui dit : quand on est dans les ennuis jusqu'au cou, mieux vaut éviter de fourrer son nez là où on ne sait pas ce qu'on va trouver. Je vous propose de repartir par là où nous sommes arrivés. »
languages.original_text: "There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a un vieil adage militaire qui dit : quand on est dans les ennuis jusqu'au cou, mieux vaut éviter de fourrer son nez là où on ne sait pas ce qu'on va trouver. Je vous propose de repartir par là où nous sommes arrivés. »

languages.text: "Eski bir askerî deyiş vardır: Boynuna kadar... Belaya battığında neyle karşılaşacağını bilmediğin yere hiç yollanma. Geldiğimiz yoldan geri dönelim derim."
languages.original_text: "There's an old military adage that says: when you're already in deep... trouble, don't poke around anywhere unless you know what you'll find there. I propose we get out the same way we came in."

traits.locale_text: "Eski bir askerî deyiş vardır: Boynuna kadar… Belaya battığında neyle karşılaşacağını bilmediğin yere hiç yollanma. Geldiğimiz yoldan geri dönelim derim."
